example.name: sometimes direct
example.text: Jumping in on big deals is a high profile way [0]-2 [*T*-1] to leapfrog the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network *trace*-2.
example.arg: the problem of not having a strong retail-banking network

example.name: usually prepositional
example.text: To make it to top-10 status, it-1 would have [*-1] to leapfrog over such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham.
example.arg: over such formidable forces as Grey Advertising, D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles and Omnicom's DDB Needham

predicate.note: Frames file for 'leapfrog' based on sentences in wsj.
